channel.title: PHP Question - Quick
channel.description: How do i use math to add 1 to a number loaded from a text file and displayed on a website? Like a counter when someone visits your site it adds 1 to the amount of visitors in total (loaded from a text file). Can anyone help me? If you can understand lol

item.title: PHP Question - Quick
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

Okay, I think I finally worked all the bugs out of the damn thing. File handling never was my strong point.

[code]<?php
define(“counter”, “./counter.log”);

if ( file_exists(counter) ) {
$count = file_get_contents(counter);
$LOG = fopen(counter, ‘wb’);
fwrite($LOG, ++$count);
fclose($LOG);
} else {
$LOG = fopen(counter, ‘wb’);
fwrite($LOG, 1);
fclose($LOG);
}
?>[/code]
